amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to add to a GAO study consideration of how changes to the navigation industry workforce with which the Army Corps of Engineers collaborates may affect safety and operations within the navigation industry.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
